Text:
Do you software to rip these sites? If so what do you use?

Thanks for the ups and advice!
I use httrack (http://www.httrack.com/) for the effective site ripping and the Unix "find" command to recursively remove non-jpeg content, thumbnails and empty directories.
Can you rip the jackass beach site? there is a few movies in your collection already!
Teleport Pro or Teleport Ultra is better  ;-)
